mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.seriesid AS "cp2pSeries.id", b.name AS "cp2pSeries.name", a.classname AS "classname", a.cronex AS "cronex", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN c_p2p_series b ON b.id = a.seriesid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_p2p_parserconfig( id, seriesid, classname, cronex, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cp2pSeries.id}, #{classname}, #{cronex}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_p2p_parserconfig SET seriesid = #{cp2pSeries.id}, classname = #{classname}, cronex = #{cronex}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
